DOC.brief_summary: Second trimester homocysteine & uterine artery doppler assess & case follow till delivery development preeclampsia , IUGR ( intra-uterine growth retardation ) & obstetric complication .
DOC.brief_title: Prediction Preeclampsia & Other Obstetric Complications Serum Homocysteine & Doppler
DOC.detailed_description: Spontaneous pregnancy risk factor include . Fasting plasma total homocysteine level sample collect 15th & 19th week . Uterine artery doppler 18th & 22nd week . Method 1 : Screen positive case consider homocysteine level 6.3umol/l Method 2 : Screen positive case consider bilateral notch mean resistivity index ( RI ) 0.55 , unilateral notch mean RI 0.65 , absence notch mean RI 0.7 . Method 3 : Screen positive case consider bilateral notch mean RI 0.55 , unilateral notch mean RI 0.65 , absence notch mean RI 0.7 combine homocysteine cut value 6.3umol / l .
DOC.criteria: spontaneous pregnancy risk factor multiple pregnancy non intact renal function hypertension diabetes folic acid supplement antifolate drug
